  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/111259</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111259</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Pogoji za rast rastlin</string>
            <string language="en">Helping plants grow well</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helfende Betriebe wachsen gut</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les usines aidantes se développent bien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As plantas de ajuda crescem bem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le piante d'assistenza si sviluppano bene</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βοηθώντας τις εγκαταστάσεις να αυξηθούν καλά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las plantas que ayudan crecen bien</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenec primerja različna stanja rastlin in ugotavlja vzroke. Ugotavlja, kako pomembni so dejavniki za uspevanje rastline.</string>
            <string language="en">Match the plant pictures to the descriptions of the condition the plants were grown in.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">voda</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">hrana</string>
            <string language="en">food</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">svetloba</string>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">rastlina</string>
            <string language="en">plant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pogoji</string>
            <string language="en">conditions</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bringen Sie die Betriebsabbildungen zu den 
Beschreibungen der Bedingung zusammen, welche die Betriebe innen 
gewachsen wurden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Appariez les images d'usine aux descriptions de 
la condition que les plantes ont été cultivées dedans.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Combine os retratos da planta às descrições da
circunstância que as plantas foram crescidas dentro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abbini le immagini della pianta alle descrizioni 
della circostanza che le piante si sono sviluppate dentro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταιριάξτε με τις εικόνες εγκαταστάσεων τις περιγραφές 
του όρου που τα φυτά αυξήθηκαν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corresponda con los cuadros de la planta a las 
descripciones de la condición que las plantas fueron crecidas 
adentro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betrieb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bedingungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nourriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">usine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">conditions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">alimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
